short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customizable AI replies on LinkedIn, Twitter, and Instagram in a single click. Drop in your OpenAI key and get started.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free OpenAI API adapter to generate replies for LinkedIn, Twitter / X, and Instagram. Does not collect any user data, no signup required. Input your GPT API key and get started. Click the OpenRepli icon in the comment interface to generate a quick reply. Customizable instructions allow you to tailor replies to your brand or persona.
